mapper.select: select mb_id, mb_name, mb_epost, mb_addr, mb_daddr, mb_nick, mb_email, mb_phone, mb_age, mb_point, mb_joindate, mb_revdate, mb_lasttime from member_tb where mb_id = #{mb_id}
mapper.insert: insert into member_tb(mb_id, mb_pw, mb_name, mb_epost, mb_addr, mb_daddr, mb_nick, mb_email, mb_phone, mb_age) values(#{mb_id}, #{mb_pw}, #{mb_name}, #{mb_epost}, #{mb_addr}, #{mb_daddr}, #{mb_nick}, #{mb_email}, #{mb_phone}, #{mb_age})
mapper.update: update member_tb set mb_id=#{mb_id}, mb_name=#{mb_name}, mb_epost=#{mb_epost}, mb_addr=#{mb_addr}, mb_daddr=#{mb_daddr}, mb_nick=#{mb_nick}, mb_email=#{mb_email}, mb_phone=#{mb_phone}, mb_age=#{mb_age}, mb_revdate=sysdate where mb_id=#{mb_id}
